PackageOracle.name: DA_SUBSCRIPTION_PRODUCT_PARTY
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SUBSCRIPTION_PRODUCT_PARTY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.21.157560000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,party_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,party_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_subscription_product_party;

body.name: DA_SUBSCRIPTION_PRODUCT_PARTY
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SUBSCRIPTION_PRODUCT_PARTY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.21.176285000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,party_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_subscription_product_party.add, parms=' || product_id || '|' || party_id || '|' || subscription_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_subscription_product_party a
(
a.product_id
,a.party_id
,a.subscription_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.product_id
,add.party_id
,add.subscription_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_subscription_product_party.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,party_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_subscription_product_party.del, parms=' || product_id || '|' || party_id || '|' || subscription_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_subscription_product_party a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.product_id = del.product_id
AND a.party_id = del.party_id
AND a.subscription_id = del.subscription_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_subscription_product_party.del');

END del;

END da_subscription_product_party;
